text: Scarlett Johansson and Kate McKinnon have a truly “ Rough Night ” in the new red - band trailer for the raunchy comedy, formerly titled “ Rock That Body. ” The cast includes Jillian Bell, Ilana Glazer, Zoe Kravitz, Ty Burrell and Demi Moore. “ Rough Night ” follows a group of five friends who were best buddies in college and reunite to rent a beach house in Miami for a wild bachelorette party. “ We are going to be swimming in d —, ” Bell ’ s character declares in front of Johansson ’ s significant other at the airport. The party gets off to a roaring start but then goes off the rails. Bell ’ s character leaps onto a male stripper at the rented condo and accidentally kills him
